definition: A feeling of monotony, tedium, or lack of interest, often experienced when one is unoccupied or engaged in unstimulating activities. It is commonly used to describe a state of boredom or ennui.

examples.german: Er versucht, seine Langeweile zu verbergen.
examples.english: He is trying to hide his boredom.
